00039 std::string TShapeSizeB1::get_name() const
00040   { return "TShapeSizeB1"; }
00041 
00042 TShapeSizeB1::~TShapeSizeB1() {}
00043 
00044 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00045                              double& result, 
00046                              MsqError&  )
00047 {
00048   const double tau = det(T);
00049   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00050     result = 0.0;
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00055   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00056   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00061                              double& result, 
00062                              MsqError&  )
00063 {
00064   const double tau = det(T);
00065   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00066     result = 0.0;
00067     return false;
00068   }
00069   
00070   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00071   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(transpose_adj(T));
00072   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00073   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00074   return true;
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00078                                        double& result,
00079                                        MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00080                                        MsqError& )
00081 {
00082   const double tau = det(T);
00083   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00084     result = 0.0;
00085     return false;
00086   }
00087   
00088   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00089   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00090   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00091   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00092   
00093   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00094   deriv_wrt_T *= 2 + 2*f;
00095   deriv_wrt_T -= 2 * f/tau * nT * adjt;
00096   
00097   return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00101                                        double& result,
00102                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00103                                        MsqError& )
00104 {
00105   const double tau = det(T);
00106   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00107     result = 0.0;
00108     return false;
00109   }
00110   
00111   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00112   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00113   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00114   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00115   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00116   
00117   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00118   deriv_wrt_T *= (1+f*nT);
00119   deriv_wrt_T -= f * T * transpose(T) * T;
00120   deriv_wrt_T -= f/tau * nadj * adjt;
00121   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00122 
00123   return true;
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00127                                        double& result,
00128                                        MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00129                                        MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00130                                        MsqError& err )
00131 {
00132   const double tau = det(T);
00133   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00134     result = 0.0;
00135     return false;
00136   }
00137   
00138   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00139   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00140   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00141   result = (1 + f) * nT - 4;
00142   
00143   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00144   deriv_wrt_T *= 2 + 2*f;
00145   deriv_wrt_T -= 2 * f/tau * nT * adjt;
00146 
00147   set_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -4*f/tau, T, adjt );
00148   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2 + 2*f );
00149   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 6*nT*f*f, adjt );
00150   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -2*nT*f/tau );
00151 
00152   return true;
00153 }
00154 bool TShapeSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00155                                        double& result,
00156                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00157                                        MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00158                                        MsqError& err )
00159 {
00160   const double tau = det(T);
00161   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00162     result = 0.0;
00163     return false;
00164   }
00165   
00166   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00167   const double nT = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00168   const double nadj = sqr_Frobenius(adjt);
00169   const double f = 1/(tau*tau);
00170   result = nT + f*nadj - 6;
00171   
00173   const MsqMatrix<3,3> dNadj_dT = 2 * (nT * T - T * transpose(T) * T);
00174   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00175   deriv_wrt_T -= f/tau * nadj * adjt;
00176   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00177   deriv_wrt_T += f * dNadj_dT;
00178  
00179     // calculate negative of 2nd wrt T of (|adj T|^2 / tau^2) (sec 3.2.2)
00180   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second_wrt_T,    f,            T );
00181   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det(    second_wrt_T, -2*f*f*nadj*tau, T );
00182   pluseq_scaled_outer_product(       second_wrt_T,  6*f*f*nadj,     adjt );
00183   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product(   second_wrt_T, -2*f*f     *tau, adjt, dNadj_dT );
00184     // calculate 2nd wrt T of this metric
00185   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2.0 );
00186 
00187   return true;
00188 }
